name: An Important Life
description:
You will start as a caterpillar and become a beautiful butterfly.

As a caterpillar, birds will try to eat you. You can use a TP with "SPACE" and you can also be invincible for a short time with "E". And you can move with "Q-D" or "A-D".

When you will have eaten enough leaf, you will metamorphosis in butterfly. You can't use the TP or the invicibility anymore, but you can fly with "Z-S" or "Q-W". Care about spider's web.

To complete the game, you need to complete the achievement of a butterfly's life.

The background's music is from www.bensound.com. The others sounds are made with SFXR.

I made all the sprites, be indulgent please.
